mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUESTION_CHOICE ( CHOICE_NO, LCT_EXAM_ID, QUESTION_NO, CHOICE_CONTENT, IS_CORRECT_YN ) VALUES ( #{choiceNo}, #{lctExamId}, #{questionNo}, #{choiceContent}, #{isCorrectYn} )
mapper.select: SELECT CHOICE_NO, LCT_EXAM_ID, QUESTION_NO, CHOICE_CONTENT, IS_CORRECT_YN FROM QUESTION_CHOICE ORDER BY CHOICE_NO
SELECT CHOICE_NO, LCT_EXAM_ID, QUESTION_NO, CHOICE_CONTENT, IS_CORRECT_YN FROM QUESTION_CHOICE WHERE CHOICE_NO = #{choiceNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE QUESTION_CHOICE SET LCT_EXAM_ID = #{lctExamId}, QUESTION_NO = #{questionNo}, CHOICE_CONTENT = #{choiceContent}, IS_CORRECT_YN = #{isCorrectYn} WHERE CHOICE_NO = #{choiceNo}
